name: Lost Potato (itch)
description:
Lost Potato is a minimalistic top-down roguelite where you can't damage enemies directly. Push them into spikes, reflect bullets and help a young potato find its way out of a jungle filled with man-eating tribes!

  • Randomly generated levels and upgrades to choose from
  • Use your environment to defeat your enemies!
  • 14 hats to unlock, each of them giving you new starting stats or traps
  • Fast-paced: average runs last 3-5 minutes
  • Keyboard & mouse recommended, although the game also supports controllers
